nodes.text: Hrdinah was a Male Gotal who was at the Black Dust Tavern on Socorro when a bar fight erupted and he picked a fight with Fenig Nabon and was knocked unconscious in the process. After the bar fight was stopped by Karl Mathieu Ancher with his Calli-Merc blaster pistol, he came to and made peace with Fenig who apoligized for his headache.
